item.description: [...] As all of this is completely invisible I decided to finish up the fruitless Sunday by tweaking bluefacedpixie. I’ve been getting some comments that planetdanika is ‘nicer’ and ‘cleaner’ than bfp. Some of this is, I’m sure, unjustified and probably just relates to to the use of san-serif fonts, bigger text and cool pics (which I took I must add). But I have succumbed, and admit that bfp was a little bit of a playground for design for a while, so I’ve switched most fonts to sans except for the main stories (serif is meant to be easier to read in the long run, even if it doesn’t seem so at the time, and I like Georgia!). I’ve also pulled the optional formatting for blog this, upped the font size and gutted the sidebar. I also hacked the wordpress calendar so that the current date would appear in bold. [...]
